item.title: TensorFlow创建特征列
item.description: import numpy as np import pandas as pd import tensorflow as tf from tensorflow import feature_column from tensorflow.keras import layers from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split 使用Pandas创建数据帧 URL = 'https://storage.googleapis.com/applied-dl/heart.csv' dataframe = pd.read_csv(URL) dataframe.head() .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type { vertical-align: middle; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: right; } age sex cp
